verses.text: \w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w take|strong="H2388"\w* \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w We|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w wear|strong="H3847"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* \w apparel|strong="H3847"\w*: \w only|strong="H7535"\w* let \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w take|strong="H2388"\w* \w away|strong="H0622"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*.

\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* bud \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* magnificence \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w glory|strong="H8597"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* high, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* great joy \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w escaped|strong="H6413"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3389"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* shall \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H6918"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* \w in|strong="H3789"\w* Sion, \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* shall \w remain|strong="H7604"\w* \w in|strong="H3789"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w called|strong="H0559"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*, \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H6918"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H3789"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \w in|strong="H3789"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* shall \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* \w away|strong="H7364"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w filth|strong="H6675"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Sion, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* shall \w wash|strong="H7364"\w* \w away|strong="H7364"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* thereof, \w by|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w by|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w burning|strong="H1197"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w create|strong="H1254"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H4349"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* Sion, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w where|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* called \w upon|strong="H5921"\w*, \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w brightness|strong="H5051"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w flaming|strong="H3852"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* protection.

\w And|strong="H3119"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* tabernacle \w for|strong="H5521"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w shade|strong="H6738"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w daytime|strong="H3119"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* heat, \w and|strong="H3119"\w* \w for|strong="H5521"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* security \w and|strong="H3119"\w* covert \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* whirlwind, \w and|strong="H3119"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w*.
